nodes.text: Yinta Lake was a city on the Mid Rim world of Vulta. It began as a small, unnamed winter retreat for the planet's wealthy arms manufacturers, who built extensive mansions along the banks of Lake Yinta, Vulta's largest freshwater lake. After the construction of a spaceport, the town, then known as Yinta began to attract individuals of middle and lower classes. As the town grew into the city of Yinta Lake, the wealthy left the metropolis and the area fell into poverty. Zeerid Korr and his daughter, Arra Yooms grew up in Yinta Lake.
